name: Choice (itch) (Velocity)
description:
Ludum Dare 47 and the theme is 'Stuck in a Loop'.

Run through three levels of obstacles but be sure to choose the correct path. choosing the wrong path will lead you back to you current level.

Watch out for red obstacles, touching them will restart the game.

If cursor shows after clicking PLAY, click the game window gain to hide cursor...(small bug from the webgl build)

Change-Log
Fixed UI Slider on menu screen.
ported for windows

Changed Pause to "P" from "escape" as issues with WebGL

Controls:

wasd - Move Mouse - Look around Shift - Walk Spacebar - Jump P - Pause
